name: Elasto
tagline: Lightweight cloud storage library and client
body:
## Elasto

Elasto is a lightweight library and client utility for managing and manipulating cloud storage objects via REST, offering:
* Microsoft Azure account, container and blob modifications
* Amazon S3 bucket and object manipulation
* File upload, download and remote copy operations
* A flexible vaguely-POSIX-like library API

![Be Safe - Use Client Side Encryption!](http://fsfe.org/contribute/promopics/thereisnocloud-v2-preview.png)

This project was created during [SUSE Hack Week](http://hackweek.suse.com/)
